title: Old Names that havent played since 2013.
body: I was looking around at names I wanted to change my name to, and I found a few I would've liked to change my name to. but it turns out they're like level 20's that haven't played since 2013, Cmonnn I want a different name. pls Rito.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Account names have a bit of immunity when it comes to being snatched up for being inactive! You can out how long an account can be inactive before the name becomes available [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-).

I just read it
and it had an interesting ending

> **MY ACCOUNT WAS PERMANENLY SUSPENDED AND I GOT AN EMAIL ABOUT THE INACTIVITY WARNING. DOES THIS MEAN THAT MY ACCOUNT WILL BE UNBANNED?**
No. This account will not become available for any reason, ever.

Now I just need to figure out what PERMANENLY is
